chapter.text: You walk to the holding cell.^1500 A large metal door comes up on your right of the tight hallway.^1500 You cant seem to find any way to open it.^1500 It seems sealed shut.^1500 As you inspect the door you hear a soft growl come from the other side.^1500 What you can only assume and hope is a one way mirror is to the left of the door.
